src:
Veselinović hvali Čukin nemački mentalitet
Na Banovom brdu ne očajavaju posale remija u Šapcu

04 Nov 2019

Impresionirali su igrači Čukaričkog srpsku javnost rezulatom, ali pre svega igrom protiv Partizana. Očekivalo se da na krilima trijumfa protiv srpskog osvajača Kupa savladaju Mačvu i još jače „pritisnu“ Crvenu zvezdu.
Međutim, Šapčani su odoleli Brđanima, ali taj rezultat nije deprimirao trenera Čukaričkog Aleksandra Veselinovića.„Utakmica je bila interesantna, u sportskom gradu Šapcu. Ljudi koji vode Mačvu su moji dugogodišnji prijatelji i zaista se osećamo prijatno kad gostujemo u ovom gradu, uvek prisustvujemo lepom gostoprimstvu. Želim Mačvi i mom kolegi Aničiću da ostvare svoje ciljeve, nadam se da će od meča sa Čukaričkim krenuti uzlaznom putanjom, s obzirom da su sigurno u poslednjih nekoliko utakmica to zaslužili, i po fudbalskoj statistici, koja može da bude varljiva, i na osnovu igara koje su bile na terenu. Podrobno smo analizirali protivnika. Ovo nije floskula, Mačva je zaslužila mnogo više, nagrada u vidu rezultata će doći“, rekao je Veselinović-.
Iako belo-crni nisu rezultatski opravdali ulogu favorita, Veselinović je bio izuzetno zadovoljan onim što su njegovi momci prikazali na Gradskom stadionu u Šapcu.„Moram da iskažem ponos i zadovoljstvo svojim igračima i ekipom. Ovo nam je bila peta utakmica u dve nedelje. Posle izvanrednih rezultata i dobre utakmice, rekao bih i zaslužene pobede protiv Partizana, očekivao sam da ćemo možda odigrati na nižem nivou, s obzirom da smo energetski i emocionalno istrošeni. Ipak, mislim da smo svojom predstavom na šabačkom stadionu totalno opravdali sve ono što smo u dosadašnjem delu prvenstva uradili“.
Trener Brđana govorio je o mnoštvu pozitivnih stvari u igri svog tima, uz naglasak da je nedostajala realizacija, pa se na kraju meča protiv Mačve mreže nisu tresle.„Uz svo poštovanje protivniku, bili smo apsolutno dominantna ekipa, nekih osam do deset šansi nismo iskoristili. Ne želim da budem bahat prema Šapčanima, ali neki put fudbal ne bude spravedljiv. Čukarički rezultatski u ovom meču nije ispraćen. Čak u drugom poluvremenu kad se očekivao naš umor posle teških utakmica, pokazali smo nemački mentalitet, gde smo na polovini protivnika odmah vraćali izgubljene lopte. Ponavljam, stvorili smo sijaset šansi, problem je bio naš pad koncentracije, ali i izvanredne reakcije protivničkog golmana, te to nismo materijalizovali. Jedini problem za nas je to što nismo postigli gol. Svim drugim sam sa fudbalske strane prezadovoljan, mislim da treba da nastavimo ovako, rezultati će doći na osnovu ovih igara“, dodao je Veselinović.
text:
Veselinovic praises Chuk's German mentality
On Ban's Hill, they do not despair of sending remas in Sabac

04 Nov 2019

The Cukaricki players impressed the Serbian public with the result, but above all, the game against Partizan. It was expected that on the wings of triumph against the Serbian Cup winner, they would defeat the Sword and push the Red Star even harder.
However, the Šapčani resisted Brđani, but that result did not depress Čukarički coach Aleksandar Veselinović. "The match was interesting, in the sports town of Šabac. The people who run the Machva are my longtime friends and we really feel comfortable when we are visiting this city, always attending to a nice hospitality. I want Machva and my colleague Anicic to achieve their goals, I hope that they will go up the road from the match with Cukaricki, since they certainly deserved it in the last few games, and according to football statistics, which can be deceptive, and based on games that were in the field. We analyzed the opponent in detail. This is not a floss, the Machva deserved much more, the reward in the form of results will come, "said Veselinovic-.
Although white and black did not justify the role of favorites, Veselinovic was extremely pleased with what his boys showed at the City Stadium in Sabac. This was our fifth game in two weeks. After great results and a good game, I would say well deserved victories against Partizan, I expected that we might play at a lower level, since we are exhausted energetically and emotionally. However, I think that with our performance at the Šabac stadium we totally justified everything that we have done in the championship so far. "
Coach Brdjan spoke about a lot of positive things in his team's game, emphasizing that there was a lack of realization, so they did not shake at the end of the match against the Mac. "With all due respect to the opponent, we were an absolutely dominant team, we did not use eight to 10 chances . I do not want to be arrogant towards Sapčani, but sometimes football is not fair. Cukaric's result was not followed in this match. Even in the second half, when our fatigue after heavy matches was expected, we showed a German mentality, where at half of the opponents we immediately returned the lost balls. Again, we created sixty chances, the problem was our decline in concentration, but also the extraordinary reaction of the goalkeeper, and we did not materialize. The only problem for us is that we didn't score. Everyone else on the football side is pleased, I think we should continue like this, the results will come from these games, "Veselinovic added.
